fields.name: amount
fields.label: Amount
fields.help: Available balance: {{formatToCoin<{{ds.account?.amount ?? 0}}>}} {{chain.denom.symbol}}

fields.name: operator
fields.label: Staking (Operator) Address
fields.map: {{ Object.keys(ds.keystore?.addressMap || {})?.map(k => ({ label: k.slice(0, 6) + "..." + String(k ?? "")?.slice(-6) + ' (' + ds.keystore.addressMap[k].keyNickname +') ' , value: k }))}}

fields.name: output
fields.label: Rewards Address
fields.map: {{ Object.keys(ds.keystore?.addressMap || {})?.map(k => ({ label: k.slice(0, 6) + "..." + String(k ?? "")?.slice(-6) + ' (' + ds.keystore.addressMap[k].keyNickname +') ' , value: k }))}}

fields.title: Signer Account Balance: {{formatToCoin<{{ds.account.amount ?? 0}}>}} {{chain.denom.symbol}}
fields.description: Available balance for transaction fees and additional stake

fields.name: amount
fields.label: {{ ds.validator ? 'New Stake Amount (optional)' : 'Amount' }}
fields.help: {{ ds.validator ? 'Leave unchanged to keep current stake amount' : 'Minimum stake amount applies' }}

messages.required: Amount is required for new stakes
messages.min: Stakes can only increase. Current stake: {{min}} {{chain.denom.symbol}}
messages.max: You cannot send more than your balance {{max}} {{chain.denom.symbol}}

fields.title: Current Stake: {{numberToLocaleString<{{fromMicroDenom<{{ds.validator.stakedAmount}}>}}>}} CNPY
fields.description: Stakes can only increase. You cannot reduce your staked amount here.

options.label: Validation
options.toolTip: This will run your own validator on the network.

options.label: Delegation
options.toolTip: This will delegate your tokens to a committee.

fields.name: isAutocompound
fields.help: Automatically restake rewards
fields.label: Autocompound

fields.title: About Committees
fields.description: Select the committees you want to delegate to. You can select up to 15 committees per validator. Your stake will be distributed across all selected committees.

fields.name: selectCommittees
fields.label: Select Committees
fields.help: Maximum 15 committees per validator.

messages.required: Please select at least one committee

columns.title: Staked Amount
columns.html: {{ (() => { const isStaked = ds.validator?.committees?.includes(row.id); const isSelected = Array.isArray(form.selectCommittees) && (form.selectCommittees.includes(row.id) || form.selectCommittees.includes(String(row.id))); const amt = Number(form.amount) || 0; if (isStaked) { const current = ds.validator.stakedAmount / 1000000; const diff = amt - current; return '' + current.toLocaleString('en-US', {maximumFractionDigits: 3}) + ' CNPY + ' + (diff > 0 ? diff : 0).toLocaleString('en-US', {maximumFractionDigits: 3}) + ' CNPY'; } else if (isSelected) { return '' + amt.toLocaleString('en-US', {maximumFractionDigits: 3}) + ' CNPY'; } else { return '0 CNPY'; } })() }}

fields.name: manualCommittees
fields.label: Committees IDs (manual override)
fields.help: Enter comma separated committee IDs to manually override selection

fields.name: validatorAddress
fields.label: Validator Address
fields.help: Put the url of the validator you want to delegate to.

fields.name: txFee
fields.label: Transaction Fee

messages.min: Transaction fee cannot be less than the network minimum: {{min}} {{chain.denom.symbol}}

fields.help: Network minimum fee: {{ fromMicroDenom<{{fees.raw.stakeFee}}> }} {{chain.denom.symbol}}

fields.title: Voting Information
fields.description: Your vote will be recorded on-chain and cannot be changed after submission. Ensure you review the proposal details before voting.

options.label: Yes
options.help: Vote in favor of the proposal

fields.title: Proposal Requirements
fields.description: Proposals require a minimum deposit and will be open for community voting. Deposits are returned if the proposal passes or is rejected normally.

fields.name: deposit
fields.label: Deposit Amount
fields.help: Minimum deposit required to submit proposal

fields.title: Pause Duration Limit
fields.description: Maximum pause duration: 4,380 blocks (~24.3 hours). If not unpaused within this period, the validator will be automatically unstaked.

fields.name: validatorAddress
fields.label: Validator Address
fields.help: The address of the validator to pause

fields.name: signerAddress
fields.label: Signer Address
fields.help: The address that will sign this transaction

fields.name: memo
fields.label: Memo (Optional)
fields.placeholder: Add a note about this pause action

fields.name: txFee
fields.label: Transaction Fee

messages.min: Transaction fee cannot be less than the network minimum: {{min}} {{chain.denom.symbol}}

fields.help: Network minimum fee: {{ fromMicroDenom<{{fees.raw.pauseFee}}> }} {{chain.denom.symbol}}

fields.title: Resume Validator Operations
fields.description: This action will resume your validator's participation in consensus and block production. Make sure your node is fully synced before unpausing.

fields.name: validatorAddress
fields.label: Validator Address
fields.help: The address of the validator to unpause

fields.name: signerAddress
fields.label: Signer Address
fields.help: The address that will sign this transaction

fields.name: memo
fields.label: Memo (Optional)
fields.placeholder: Add a note about this unpause action

fields.name: txFee
fields.label: Transaction Fee

messages.min: Transaction fee cannot be less than the network minimum: {{min}} {{chain.denom.symbol}}

fields.help: Network minimum fee: {{ fromMicroDenom<{{fees.raw.unpauseFee}}> }} {{chain.denom.symbol}}

fields.title: About Polls
fields.description: Community polls allow validators and delegators to gauge sentiment on non-binding proposals. Results are publicly visible but do not execute on-chain actions.

fields.name: question
fields.label: Poll Question
fields.placeholder: What would you like to ask?

fields.name: description
fields.label: Description (Optional)
fields.placeholder: Provide additional context for the poll...

onSuccess.title: Poll Created!
onSuccess.description: Your poll has been created successfully

fields.name: validatorAddress
fields.label: Validator Address
fields.help: The address of the validator to unstake

fields.name: signerAddress
fields.label: Signer Address
fields.help: The address that will sign this transaction

fields.name: memo
fields.label: Memo (Optional)
fields.placeholder: Add a note about this unstake action

fields.label: Transaction Fee

messages.min: Transaction fee cannot be less than the network minimum: {{min}} {{chain.denom.symbol}}

fields.help: Network minimum fee: {{ fromMicroDenom<{{fees.raw.unstakeFee}}> }} {{chain.denom.symbol}}

onSuccess.title: Unstake Successful!
onSuccess.description: Your validator has been unstaked. Funds will be available after the unstaking period

onError.title: Unstake Failed
onError.description: {{result.error || 'An error occurred while processing your unstake request.'}}

fields.title: Proposal Requirements
fields.description: Parameter change proposals require +2/3 validator approval to pass. Ensure start/end heights allow sufficient voting time.

fields.name: parameterKey
fields.label: Parameter Key
fields.help: Available parameters will depend on the selected space

fields.name: parameterValue
fields.label: New Parameter Value
fields.help: The new value for this parameter

fields.name: startHeight
fields.label: Start Height
fields.help: Block height when voting begins

fields.name: endHeight
fields.label: End Height
fields.help: Block height when voting ends. Must be > start height and within 10,000 blocks.

messages.min: End height must be at least {{min}} (start height + 1).
messages.max: End height must be at most {{max}} (start height + 10,000).

fields.name: signerAddress
fields.label: Proposer (Validator Address)
fields.help: Must be a validator address to create proposals

endHeight.value: {{(() => { const s = Number(form.startHeight || resolveHeight(ds.height)); const eRaw = Number(form.endHeight); const e = eRaw > 0 ? eRaw : s + 1; return Math.min(Math.max(e, s + 1), s + 10000); })()}}

onSuccess.title: Parameter Change Proposal Submitted!
onSuccess.description: Your proposal has been submitted for validator voting

fields.title: Treasury Proposal Requirements
fields.description: DAO treasury transfers require +2/3 validator approval to pass. Funds will be automatically transferred if proposal is approved.

fields.name: amount
fields.label: Treasury Amount
fields.placeholder: Amount to transfer from DAO treasury
fields.help: Amount of {{chain.denom.symbol}} to request from DAO treasury

fields.name: recipientAddress
fields.label: Recipient Address
fields.help: The address that will receive the funds if proposal passes

fields.name: startHeight
fields.label: Start Height
fields.help: Block height when voting begins

fields.name: endHeight
fields.label: End Height
fields.help: Block height when voting ends. Must be > start height and within 10,000 blocks.

messages.min: End height must be at least {{min}} (start height + 1).
messages.max: End height must be at most {{max}} (start height + 10,000).

fields.name: memo
fields.label: Memo / Justification
fields.placeholder: Provide justification for this treasury request...
fields.help: Explanation of why this transfer is needed

fields.name: signerAddress
fields.label: Proposer Address (Validator)
fields.help: Must be a validator address to create proposals

endHeight.value: {{(() => { const s = Number(form.startHeight || resolveHeight(ds.height)); const eRaw = Number(form.endHeight); const e = eRaw > 0 ? eRaw : s + 1; return Math.min(Math.max(e, s + 1), s + 10000); })()}}

onSuccess.title: DAO Transfer Proposal Submitted!
onSuccess.description: Your treasury request has been submitted for validator voting

fields.title: Vote Removal Notice
fields.description: This will permanently remove your vote from the specified proposal. You can vote again later if the voting period is still active.

fields.name: proposalHash
fields.label: Proposal Hash
fields.help: The hash of the proposal to remove your vote from

fields.name: voterAddress
fields.label: Voter Address (Validator)
fields.help: Your validator address

onSuccess.title: Vote Removed!
onSuccess.description: Your vote has been successfully removed from the proposal

fields.title: About Community Polls
fields.description: Community polls are non-binding votes to gauge community sentiment. Your vote will be publicly recorded but will not trigger any on-chain actions.

fields.name: pollQuestion
fields.label: Poll Question
fields.help: The exact question from the poll you want to vote on

fields.name: pollEndBlock
fields.label: Poll End Block
fields.help: The end block height of the poll

messages.min: Poll end block must be at least {{min}} (current height + 1).

fields.name: pollURL
fields.label: Poll URL (Optional)
fields.help: Optional URL for poll discussion

pollJSON.value: {{JSON.stringify({ proposal: form.pollQuestion, endBlock: Math.max(parseInt(form.pollEndBlock || '0', 10), resolveHeight(ds.height) + 1), URL: form.pollURL || '' })}}

onSuccess.title: Poll Vote Submitted!
onSuccess.description: Your vote on the community poll has been recorded

fields.name: proposal
fields.label: Proposal
fields.help: Clearly describe the question or decision being voted on.

fields.name: endBlock
fields.label: End Block

messages.min: End block must be at least {{min}} (current height + 1).

fields.help: Use a valid future block height to allow participation.

fields.name: URL
fields.label: Discussion URL
fields.help: Optional link to Discord, forum, or proposal context.

onSuccess.title: Poll Submitted
onSuccess.description: The new governance poll transaction was broadcast successfully.

fields.name: proposalHash
fields.label: Proposal Hash
fields.map: {{Object.entries(ds['gov.poll'] || {}).map(([k, v]) => { const h = v?.proposalHash || k; return { label: String(h).slice(0, 12) + '...', value: h }; })}}
fields.help: Select the poll hash to auto-fill proposal details.

fields.name: proposal
fields.label: Proposal
fields.value: {{(() => { const selected = form.proposalHash || form.proposal || ''; const proposals = ds['gov.proposals'] || {}; const direct = proposals[selected]?.proposal?.msg; if (direct) return selected; const byMsgHashKey = Object.keys(proposals).find(k => proposals[k]?.proposal?.msg?.proposalHash === selected); if (byMsgHashKey) return byMsgHashKey; return selected; })()}}
fields.help: Must match the existing poll proposal text.

fields.name: endBlock
fields.label: End Block
fields.value: {{(() => { const selected = form.proposalHash || form.proposal || ''; const proposals = ds['gov.proposals'] || {}; const direct = proposals[selected]?.proposal?.msg?.endHeight; if (direct != null && direct !== '') return direct; const byMsgHashKey = Object.keys(proposals).find(k => proposals[k]?.proposal?.msg?.proposalHash === selected); if (byMsgHashKey) { const fallback = proposals[byMsgHashKey]?.proposal?.msg?.endHeight; if (fallback != null && fallback !== '') return fallback; } return form.endBlock ?? ''; })()}}

messages.min: End block must be at least {{min}} (current height + 1).

fields.help: Must match the poll endBlock value.

fields.name: URL
fields.label: Discussion URL
fields.value: {{(() => { const selected = form.proposalHash || ''; const polls = ds['gov.poll'] || {}; const byKey = polls[selected]?.proposalURL; if (byKey) return byKey; const byProposalHashKey = Object.keys(polls).find(k => polls[k]?.proposalHash === selected); if (byProposalHashKey) return polls[byProposalHashKey]?.proposalURL || ''; return form.URL ?? ''; })()}}
fields.help: Should match the poll URL when one exists.

fields.name: startBlock
fields.label: Start Block
fields.help: Always uses current chain height.

fields.name: endBlock
fields.label: End Block

messages.min: End block must be at least {{min}} (start block + 1).
messages.max: End block must be at most {{max}} (start block + 10,000).

fields.help: Must be greater than start block and within 10,000 blocks.

endBlock.value: {{(() => { const s = Number(form.startBlock || resolveHeight(ds.height)); const eRaw = Number(form.endBlock); const e = eRaw > 0 ? eRaw : s + 1; return Math.min(Math.max(e, s + 1), s + 10000); })()}}

onSuccess.title: Parameter Change Proposal Submitted
onSuccess.description: Your proposal transaction was broadcast successfully.

messages.min: Transaction fee cannot be less than the network minimum: {{min}} {{chain.denom.symbol}}

fields.name: startBlock
fields.label: Start Block
fields.help: Always uses current chain height.

fields.name: endBlock
fields.label: End Block

messages.min: End block must be at least {{min}} (start block + 1).
messages.max: End block must be at most {{max}} (start block + 10,000).

fields.help: Must be greater than start block and within 10,000 blocks.

endBlock.value: {{(() => { const s = Number(form.startBlock || resolveHeight(ds.height)); const eRaw = Number(form.endBlock); const e = eRaw > 0 ? eRaw : s + 1; return Math.min(Math.max(e, s + 1), s + 10000); })()}}

onSuccess.title: Treasury Subsidy Proposal Submitted
onSuccess.description: Your treasury proposal transaction was broadcast successfully.

fields.name: proposalTx
fields.label: Raw Proposal JSON
fields.help: Advanced mode: paste a fully signed raw transaction JSON to broadcast via /v1/tx.

summary.label: Payload
summary.value: Raw JSON transaction will be sent to /v1/tx

onSuccess.title: Raw Transaction Broadcast
onSuccess.description: The raw transaction was sent to the network endpoint.

fields.name: currentVoteStatus
fields.label: Current Vote Status
fields.value: {{(() => { const v = ds['gov.proposals']?.[form.proposalId]?.approve; if (v === true) return 'Approved'; if (v === false) return 'Rejected'; return 'No vote'; })()}}

fields.name: changeSummary
fields.label: Proposed Change (Explicit)
fields.value: {{(() => { const p = ds['gov.proposals']?.[form.proposalId]?.proposal || {}; const m = p.msg || {}; if (m.parameterSpace && m.parameterKey) return `Parameter change: ${m.parameterSpace}.${m.parameterKey} -> ${m.parameterValue}`; if (p.type === 'daoTransfer') return `Treasury subsidy: amount=${m.amount ?? p.amount ?? 'N/A'}; memo=${p.memo ?? ''}`; return `Type=${p.type || 'unknown'}; memo=${p.memo || 'N/A'}`; })()}}

onSuccess.title: Proposal Vote Saved
onSuccess.description: Your proposal vote preference has been updated.

fields.name: currentVoteStatus
fields.label: Current Vote Status
fields.value: {{(() => { const v = ds['gov.proposals']?.[form.proposalId]?.approve; if (v === true) return 'Approved'; if (v === false) return 'Rejected'; return 'No vote'; })()}}

fields.name: changeSummary
fields.label: Proposed Change (Explicit)
fields.value: {{(() => { const p = ds['gov.proposals']?.[form.proposalId]?.proposal || {}; const m = p.msg || {}; if (m.parameterSpace && m.parameterKey) return `Parameter change: ${m.parameterSpace}.${m.parameterKey} -> ${m.parameterValue}`; if (p.type === 'daoTransfer') return `Treasury subsidy: amount=${m.amount ?? p.amount ?? 'N/A'}; memo=${p.memo ?? ''}`; return `Type=${p.type || 'unknown'}; memo=${p.memo || 'N/A'}`; })()}}

onSuccess.title: Proposal Vote Removed
onSuccess.description: Your proposal vote preference was removed.
